docs.lead_paragraph: One day during medical school, my classmates and I learned that one of the most well-liked doctors-in-training in the hospital had had a seizure while leading morning work rounds.

headline.main: Seeing Epilepsy From the Patient’s Point of View

docs.abstract: Dr. Brien J. Smith, new chairman of the Epilepsy Foundation, knows firsthand about the disease: He learned as a teenager that he had epilepsy.
docs.snippet: Dr. Brien J. Smith, new chairman of the Epilepsy Foundation, knows firsthand about the disease: He learned as a teenager that he had epilepsy.
